text: Jan Espen Kruse (born 9 July 1956) is a Norwegian journalist and correspondent. He was born in Larvik. In 1990 he joined the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation's foreign news desk, and from 1991 to 1996 he was their correspondent in Moscow.Østlands-Posten 23 January 2010, p. 7 From 2003 to 2007 he held the same position in Washington, DC, and in 2018 he was hired for a new stint in Moscow."Fire menn reiser ut for NRK", Stavanger Aftenblad 7 February 2003 ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Larvik Category:NRK people Category:Norwegian television reporters and correspondents Category:Norwegian expatriates in Russia Category:Norwegian expatriates in the United States
title: Jan Espen Kruse
